replies.body:
{{champion:57}} "empowered saplings are dealing too much damage in the early game (especially if maxed first)." Gives him the max rank enemy health ratio damage at rank 1 of the skill. You're kidding right? Rank 1 damage on this skill is basically unchanged. Base health being a bit over 500 means that 1 sapling in bush previously dealt. 
45 + ((12% max health) = 60) = 105 compared to
25 + ((16% max health) = 80) = 105. Maokai in botlane is still going to completely zone you out of bushes. GG rito

The change is meant to impact E-max-first builds, where he will go through his mana faster and deal less damage per sapling.  He will zone you out of bushes until he's OOM and every mage support will out poke him and melee support out fight him from then on.

you will be zoned out of bushes completely, so you wont be able to trade properly since you won't be able to break minion aggro easily. The nerf damage is negligible at best and mana regen runes with meditation mastery fix most of the mana sustain issue. Even if it is going to make him go oom you can very easily time it with a wave push and recall timing. Maxing e is still going to be really obnoxious.
Please can we have All for One, Urf, ARSR or summoners rift hexakill we have had ascension and poro king back to back for ages!!!! why do we have the same que to weeks in a  row?
It has been 4 patches now and still there is no fix for the movement prediction bug :):):):):)
Aww come on im pretty sure that most people want URF and ascension was here not long ago
How about URF? Havent had that shit in ages. No one wants your shitty poro king or boring ass ascension
Hey guys, come and join the largest discord server in the OCE region with over 1.4k members! https://discord.gg/2PdgYXA

I really hate what happened to yorick. I cant make my ghouls follow me anymore so the only way to get the ghouls to follow me is to summon them in the jungle and from only 3 camps. Why rito help me?{{champion:83}}
This might be only me but i cant play league anymore on my Mac after this update. i cant even get to the login screen plz help ASAP.
bit far fetched but could we please get a chroma pack for cosmic reaver Kassadin :3
RIP Heimer top. My days of getting 2 for 1 after dying to ganks are over.
what are the chances rammus will just roll by without anyone noticing?
When can I play with my 3 mates in flex?

I don't see why we can't have 4man groups in flex queue already, since we certainly have a number of 'solo only' flex queue players too (don't ask why these people exist, just accept that they're weird). Come on riot, sort this.
